results.content:
Very nice and easy to follow mini projects. Nice voice, not too calm but also not too excited and straight to the point.

The projects themselves had me inspired to look deeper into their topics - especially the canvas part at the end.

It was fun working along.

response.content:
Hi Minhtam,

Thanks for the review even though we are a bit surprised with it :) Because we mention three times that this course is not for absolute beginners. We mention it in the requirements of the course, in the course description and in the introduction video.

1. Requirements 
•	This course is NOT for absolute beginners!
•	Solid basic knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
•	Be able to create JS functions, arrays, objects, etc.

2. The Course Description:
ATTENTION: You should have solid basic knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript. If you are an absolute beginner, we would suggest first taking The Result-Oriented Web Developer Course – BOOTCAMP 2021 where we explain HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript from scratch.

3. In the Introduction Video (0:30 – 0:38):
This course is a good one to take after our Result-Oriented Web Developer Course because in that course we explain CSS and JavaScript from scratch. 

In all our courses we respond to every question of our students. So, if you have any questions, feel free to post them in the Q&A section of the course. We will be happy to help :)

Kind regards,
Vertex Academy
response.content_html:
Hi Minhtam,

Thanks for the review even though we are a bit surprised with it :) Because we mention three times that this course is not for absolute beginners. We mention it in the requirements of the course, in the course description and in the introduction video.

1. Requirements
• This course is NOT for absolute beginners!
• Solid basic knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
• Be able to create JS functions, arrays, objects, etc.

2. The Course Description:
ATTENTION: You should have solid basic knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript. If you are an absolute beginner, we would suggest first taking The Result-Oriented Web Developer Course – BOOTCAMP 2021 where we explain HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript from scratch.

3. In the Introduction Video (0:30 – 0:38):
This course is a good one to take after our Result-Oriented Web Developer Course because in that course we explain CSS and JavaScript from scratch.

In all our courses we respond to every question of our students. So, if you have any questions, feel free to post them in the Q&A section of the course. We will be happy to help :)

Kind regards,
Vertex Academy
